original_title: Secrets de famille - La fille adoptive
overview: How would you react if you learnt that your parents were not who they pretend they are and that yo're not their biological daughter? That's exactly what the pretty Cléa is going to live in Marc Dorcel's new production, directed by Liselle Bailey. In Family secrets - the adopted daughter, this young woman lives the same life as all the girls her age. She goes out with friends, learns about the pleasures of sex and live a life as normal as can be.
title: The Adopted Daughter: Family Secrets
